summary:
After my graduation in 2006, I have gained significant work experience in Italy and in France in different fields such as interior design and urban development. I have taught for the last 7 years art and architectural design at secondary school in Italy.
I have a thorough knowledge of the English and French language. I also have an intermediate level of german language and my mother tongue is Italian. Recently I have relocated to The Hague and I am currently learning Dutch.

projects:
[{'title': 'Hospitality design', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'description': 'LOCATION

The Hotel is a 4 stars Hotel located on the mountain in Italy.
 
PROJECT

The renovation project started in 2008 and concerned all the 16 rooms of the Hotel. The project included: 
- bathroom design
- room design
- lighting and electrical layouts
- furniture design
- colors, textures and other interior finishes

MY DUTIES

I collaborated with the interior design firm in charge of this project. My duties were:
- discussed requirements with clients and setting project schedules and budget 
- conceived layouts, furniture design and lighting plans
- selected colours, materials, finishes, furniture and accessories
- responsible for management and oversight of manufacturers and contractors
